body_html: @theflofly, thanks for the work you've done so far with gradients and optimizers. GradientDescentOptimizer was very useful in my project as there is no optimizer implementation in current tensorflow c++ SDK. In the future we would like to have AdamOptimizer in our software as it has proven to be more robust in our case. What are your plans on implementing that one?
